biocontainers.name: gemma
biocontainers.summary: Gemma is an open source database, analysis software system and web site for expression data re-use and meta-analysis. it currently contains analyzed data from over 3300 expression profiling studies, yielding billions of data points that can be searched and explored. gemma offers web-based access to differential expression results and coexpression data in a meta-analysis framework.

biotools.summary: Gemma provides data, experimental design annotations, and differential expression analysis results for thousands of microarray and RNA-seq experiments. We re-analyze raw data from public sources (primarily NCBI GEO), annotate experimental conditions, conduct quality control and compute differential expression using standardized procedures. We have especially good coverage of experiments relevant to the nervous system.
